content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the home run derby, when i rose to use the restroom. before i turned the light on, i noticed a greenish light in the woods behind my home. i ran downstairs and grabbed binoculars, through which i clearly viewed a group of circular lights. they were greenish yellow and seemed to be blinking slowly.I watched for about ten minutes before the l ights blinked off and faded into the trees. 
    my father saw the same craft at about 930 the previous night, and watched it through binoculars for nearly an hour. 
    neither of us is easily scred, but these sightings have rendered us nearly incapable of sleep.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: A cluster of greenish flashing lights, seemed to be in a figure-eight shape

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back porch, picking up my grill stuff, when i looked up and saw the moon being covered by clouds, then suddenly, below it to the right, there was a disc shaped outline in white light with a smaller cluster of white lights off to the bottom right of it.  i took a picture with my iphone that didn't come out and by the time i grabbed my good camera, it was gone.  i was with a friend and her and i thought it was the moon, but since we had just seen it above it, we realized it had to be something else.  there was no noise at all, completely quiet outside. the objects just remained stationary in the sky until they were covered by the clouds from the storm moving in,  i am not sure what it was, it was very interesting, and i would love to know what it was.  i have no explanation as to what it could have been,  i will try and enhance the photo and get back to you all.
content.summary: It was like an outline of a disc, and a small cluster of lights

content.detailedDescription: 3 times over the last 3 weeks witnessed all three times by me and once by my mother with me. i have seen a round object that flashes white very slowly from dark to very bright then completely shuts off, but you can still see a small dark object flying afterwards. the first incident lasted for about 5-10 minutes. the second time was only for about a minute or 2 with only 3 flashes. the 3rd was only seconds and was only 1 flash but was absolutely the same object. i'm used to seeing meteors and airplanes where i live and this is neither.
content.summary: Slow flashing round object that flashes dark to very bright the goes dark.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this ufo two nights on july 9th and 10th on a farm north of california mo.I went out side to watch fire-flies and saw this beautiful cross,it sort of danced?  it was high in the sky and then would, move very fast almost instantly, but gracefully,come almost to the top of the trees. and then repeate the same pattern.


i lost sight of the ufo ,when i went into the house to tell the other people to come out side to see the cross. it was a lovely sight and i knew it was a ufo because of the way it moved.
content.summary: Bright blue cross shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Watching backyard fireworks in the greenbelt. several others saw it at the same time. comments like "what the ... is that" and "look at that"
content.summary: Drifting south to north at slow speed about 100 ft above ground. red-orange glow from inside rectangular shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed watching t.V. and i heard a noise that i thought was a jet getting ready to pass over my home. i made the statement "jets at this time of night?" and waited for them to get louder. the noise never got louder it stopped. i looked towards my window and saw lights coming through the shade. i was curious as to what it was so i pulled back the shade. i saw a triangular ufo one clear light at each tip perfectly spaced from each other with a large red light in the middle. the lights were very bright. the object traveled very slowly and stopped to hover for a around 30 secs. above my neighbors home. i jumped up to run to the door to go outside to get a better look but by the time i got there it was gone.It appeared to be so low that i actually woke my husband up because i thought the object was going to crash. as i was looking at the object through the window i could not hear any noise. there seemed to be no disruption of the trees around the object and my dogs weren't barking at it.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object in sky outside my window.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard swimming in the pool. as i was floating on my back, i noticed a silvery-white object moving through the sky in the north. at first i didn't think much of it, until i noticed that it didn't have wings like a plane, and it was the wrong shape for a helicopter. a helicopter would have been larger in the front, and smaller in the back, but for this object that was the opposite. i watched it for a little while, but then went back to swimming. about five minutes later, i looked up again and there it was on the opposite side of the sky. again, i began to swim again. looking once more a few minutes later, it was back in the northern sky. i watched it until it went behind a large pine tree, but a minute or so later, it was once again in the other part of the sky. i watched it as it circled around towards north again, wondering what it could be. i glanced away this time just for a second or two, and when i looked back, the object had completely vanished. at the rate it was moving, it should have still been visible, with no objects to block it from view, but there was no sign of it.
content.summary: White/silver object without wings or tail, making slow circles in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of july 10th 2011 at approximately 10:30 p.M. in durant, oklahoma my son zakk and wife bonnie called for me to come outside to observe some strange phenomina located just a few degrees east of the 3/4 wanning moon. it appeared to be some sort of chemtrail or other bizzare cloud formation coming from the south and trailing to the north.

i told them my thoughts on this being that i have studied astronomy and have made a hobby of telescope observations for some 25 yrs. i also have 20 yrs in law enforcement and security training. we watched the hot summer skies for a few moments and then we all returned inside, as i was heading in, my wife said "don't forget the trash", as all wifes are good at... 

at approximately 10:45 p.M. i had gathered the trash and was heading out the front door which faces due east. as i approached the trash can by the road i noticed a bright reddish light coming through the trees accross the street. i first thought that it was various electric pole lights shining through. i noticed that it seemed to be moving at a fairly slow speed, that of a helicopter, we live close to the hospital and always see and hear lifeflight choppers coming in to the hospital. this was different, it had no sound which i was listening for and was a fireball, twice the size of antares the red star of scorpio. i would estimate 25 feet in diameter. i paused a few seconds waiting as usual to see it desentigrate, it continued on its flight path from beyound the tree in the east heading at a slow pace toward the northwest. i then realized this was something unusual, dropped the trash and ran in the house, i told my son who was at the computer to get his mom (she was in bed)and hurry to come outside. i then returned after 5 seconds or so expecting the object to be gone, i noticed that it was still heading in the same direction only slightly dimmer. my wife and son and i watched as it vanished into the northwest horizon, my wife and i were saying that it appeared to be a plane or some object on fire? but "no sound"? my wife then said this has been a weird night which my son and i agreed. we then observed in the same location to the east another fireball object from behind the same tree heading in the same flight path 'no sound;. as i was explaining to my wife the events, we all three noticed another silvery object shoot by from east to west at the blink of an eye. my wife and i have spent numoruos nights observing the leoniods meteor showers and others throughout the years and have never seen these events.
we all felt excited and in ahh to have witnessed this event.
these events are as accurate and honost to the best of my abilities.
we made no 911 calls for we believe noone was in danger and for the fear of being rediculed.

thank you,

ron gilmore

july 11th 2011
content.summary: Wife, son and myself observed two fireball objects moving slowly from east to northwest.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside around 4 to 430 a.M.  on 7/11/11.  i am new to writing this stuff down so i am not quite sure of the exact time.  i went out for a cigar.  i looked up in the sky directly above me and noticed a very faint yellowish light high in the sky.  i was really studying it because i was in the air force and have a base near by and this light did not seem to be any plane i had been familiar with.  it was going faster than i thought it should.  it was really high so i was also trying to tell if i could see if this yellowish white orb light was pulsating like a strobe light or if there was a red and green light near for the wings.  there was not.  then the light vanished completely and suddenly while i was watching it.  now there was no clouds in the sky and i had visible stars in the vicinity of the disappearance.  for reference i was staring at the northeast sky.

then out of the corner of my eye to the east i see a flash and turn to see if i can see it clearly but it is not there.  within 10 seconds a very bright light in a sort of orb shape lights up it jumps a short distance very fast and disappears.  this orb like light is way bigger than the one i first saw but it is also lower in the sky.  it also appears white whereas the first looked dim and yellow.

i stayed outside for about 10 minutes then went inside and told my wife to come and watch with me.  she thought i was crazy but went out for about 2 minutes.  i stayed outside a good 45 minutes without anymore events.  i went out last night too with out anything happening.
content.summary: Watched a small dim orb light then  two bright flash orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself along with 5 friends were out on their deck enjoying the evening when one of us noticed this very bright and firey round/oval shape the was traveling across the northern sky. it had no blinking lights and no sound at all. it was a bright orangey red like it was on fire. 
it seemed to move up into the atmoshere until it slowly disappeared. 
there were no clouds that night for it to go behind either. 
one of my friends dismissed it as a chinese lantern, but personally i feel it was too large to be this and i don't think they burn that brightly. 
i may be buying one and launching it just to see if it might just have been one of those.   
just not sure of what we saw!
content.summary: It was a circular shape that seemed to be on fire.

content.detailedDescription:
We were traveling north on i39 as we approached the tonica exit, we noticed several objects, black against the evening sky, to the western horizon, presumed them to be helicopters, as we've seen a helicopter convoy through that area once before. a few miles further on i had been watching this current convoy as far as we could before the terrain blocked them out.  as we got off at the first lasalle exit, heading north, i looked to the skies towards where the convoy would have been, and then an odd lighted object; higher, slightly closer, i had my camera, and took a picture (picture 1) before loosing sight of it as we descended into the valley.  did not see it anytime beyond that point in the daylight.

a couple hours later we are heading south on i39 heading home, as we approached the tonica exit, i looked to the west and the activity was still in progress, i took a photo of the object, even closer at this point, still a couple miles out.  the "helicopters" if that is what they were, were much closer, half mile or less, and seemed to be lifting off from the fields. surrounding the object in the sky, the object had a large whitish rhomboid light, (looks rather greenish on film), with depth to it, like a large chamber, and a red light to either side and slightly behind, the whitish light. it was slowely weaving back and forth so sometimes both red lights were visible other times only the one.  i took a few pictures, would check the picture and delete it if it was too blurry i only had a few spots left on the sd card.  i got one good nighttime close up (picture 2), and then its lights went out.  

i had my wife stop the car, and i got out; on the interstate to take a couple of pictures of the lifting off "helicopters".  i took two more pictures, a still photo (not sent), and a 30 second time lapse of the area (picture 3), i set the camera on the hood of the car, it was still running, so the picture is a bit jumpy but not as jumpy as it would seem please note by looking at the centered ascending lights, then note how much smoother the plane trajectory is in the upper left of the timelapse, this compared to the wild movements of the closer two lights. 

once they got to their altitude they moved off in near opposite directions. the other "helicopters" are further away to the far right of the picture and did not get on film, they were further away and behind the main object. note i never really heard the helicopters, it was still  busy on the interstate, only 7pm or a slight bit later, but they were close enough i should have heard something, but i didn't. they moved off for awhile,the light intensities remained constant, then as one, they shut off their lights as well.  no strobes on any of the "helicopters" anywhere, anytime.

the whitish light with the red light which has gone black in picture 3, would have been to the right (north) of the near objects lower than the gray horizontal squiggly (center right), and an entire squiggly length behind the horizontal sqiggly.
content.summary: Unknown object sighted along with heavy "helicopter" activity i39 s of lasalle

content.detailedDescription: Taking night pictures of what seem to be stars,here u go
content.summary: Taking pictures of stars on a tri pod and this is what i got

content.detailedDescription: We were outside getting ready to shoot firecrackers. my son noticed a really bright orange light in sky. it was still a little daylight so he thought that odd something so bright in the sky. he watched it & thought it was a plane at first, the closer it got the more he figured out it was not a plane. he is an a & p mechanic so he knows what a plane looks like. this was just a really bright orange light. it came from the east & went west over us. it had no sound. it had no other lights on it.  it was about 3,000 feet up. it was going real slow. after it went over it started to fade out then just disappeared. it made a believer out of him. i'd been telling him for years since my 2001 sighting there were things out there unexplainable. it left you wondering what the heck did i just see.
content.summary: Orange light really bright moving across sky

content.detailedDescription: I have been taking pictures of certain star like objects and i had some really neat things come up. there seems to be a few that are not just stars, all these are taken from a tri pod in series of ten shots a t a time.
content.summary: Taking pictures of lights at dark with tri pod and these are what i got

content.detailedDescription:
Was in my pool, looking at the sky for satellites and noticed the object(s).  four star-like dots flying in v formation east to west in the northern sky.  were very close together, moving too fast for an airplane (appeared to be much higher than a plane would be anyway) and too fast for satellites.  i only saw it for 4, maybe 5 seconds.  as it disappeared, i saw what i first thought was a shooting star going straight down from where the object was, almost a 90 degree angle from the direction the objects were going.  my attention shifted to that single object as it fell and then disappeared behind the neighbors house.  when it did, i tried to find the other objects and they were gone.  after thinking about it, i realized that there was no trail on the shooting star, just a bright dot of light falling.

the first four objects weren't very bright, maybe "medium brightness star-like".  the object that fell downward was much brighter, more "planet-like".  at first thought i believed i was looking at an owl (bright moon out tonight and i thought it was simply reflecting on a bird).  but after a second i realized it wasn't a bird and that's when i realized it was much higher than a plane would be, almost like they were in orbit.  

i stayed in the pool another 10 minutes to see the objects would appear again.  after that, i really got nervous/scared over what i had seen and went inside.  it's 2:00am and i'm wide awake.  i don't think i'm going to get much sleep tonight.  i've always hoped to see something like this, but now that i have, i'm a little freaked out.
content.summary: Four star-like dots, flying in v formation, last seen as one of them dropped straight down like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday (july 9th 2011) i posted on here that i had realized that photographs i had taken on june 27th 2011 of the volcanic mt. shasta contained many ufos. my boyfriend and i decided to head back to mt. shasta today (july 10th 2011) to try and spot ufos either by camera or by naked eye or both. neither of us saw any ufos while present at the base of mt. shasta. however i was able to get many photos while there. when i came home i zoomed into the photos taken today and once again there are ufos present in many of the photos!! i am extremely surprised and i feel compelled to share this again on this site because it is quite amazing. when looking at certain photos, one after another, a few black balls seems to be moving in a semi-consistent direction although i do not have any video.It is almost as if i cannot see whatever the things are with my naked eye. i tried to look hard while i was there to see if i could spot anything out of the ordinary but my eyes saw absolutely nothing.
content.summary: Ufos spotted with digital camera at mt. shasta volcano again!!!

content.detailedDescription: On 09july11 at approximately from 10:20pm to 10:33pm chicago time i observed a very bright orange and red fireball or flame like object in the the clear night sky from my rear deck of my house. as it descended the fireball or flame object made j type turn and changed into a white color before a lost sight of it over the tree lines.This object was moving very slow, i would say slower then an airplane but much higher in altitude. i thought it was an airplane on fire but did not hear anything on the news. i was surprised by was occured but have the need to report it. i'm still trying to make sense out of the whole thing.
content.summary: a very bright orange and red  fireball or flame like shape in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: During the night shift, the observer went around to the back side of his workplace to stretch his legs.  he went about his usual scan of the sky around the airfield past the stand of trees at the building's rear, starting with the eastern sky, picking out the various blinking traffic lights along the horizon's edge, moving up to the prominent planet further up in the eastern sky, and then turning west where the airfield's beacon sweeps the sky.  it was noticed then, that an object was moving with a north to south trajectory.  the object had a brightness similar to the planet seen earlier, but its movement was much more noticeable than a planet's would be.  at first, it appeared to be a low-flying plane with its landing lights on--perhaps just taking off or preparing to land at the nearby local airport.  however, the object did not have the usual red and green running lights illuminated.  after a brief moment (2 to 3 seconds) of observation, the object's white light increased in luminosity, increasing over a period of approximately 5 seconds, approaching the brightness of a full moon.  it seemed similar to what might occur if a plane, as mentioned above with its landing lights were on, changed trajectory towards the observer.  the object remained bright for a brief moment (about a second) then quickly faded to being dimmer than the background stars.  at that time, the observer lost track of the object.  during this event, the velocity and trajectory of the object both appeared constant, and no engine noise could be heard.  it should be noted that the observer has witnessed small planes land at the nearby airfield during the night, and engine noise was always noticeable as the plane neared or departed.
content.summary: Meteor-like with relatively slow velocity and straight trajectory

content.detailedDescription: Tonight my brother and i saw what appeared to be 3 satellites crossing paths over head, from my back yard. we both spotted one headed to our left (not sure the direction) and seconds later spotted 2 more flying the opposite direction towards the first object, crossing each others paths. slowly they spread apart (weird to me seeing they were flying right beside each other for about 15 seconds). i have never seen satellites pass each other so close before let alone 3 at a time.
content.summary: 3 satellites crossing over head rare?

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting in oklahoma


cleora, ok
grand lake of the cherokees

at approximately 11:00 p.M. on july 2nd, my family and i witnessed 3 ufo���s.  we were sitting on my outside deck visiting when 2 bright orange lights rose up above the tree line.  we were looking toward the se.  without knowing for sure the objects sizes i am not sure of the taking off point or altitude at hover.  my best guess is that they were 3 meters or so in circumference which from my estimation could have placed them in the lake.  any way they rose to maybe 500 to a 1000 feet  and hovered.  then one of the object took a path away from us toward the se while the other took a nw path over our heads.  the object was very visible while it went over head and what had appeared only bright and orange took more of a stubby cylinder shape with rotating red lights on the bottom of it.  as it continued its path we were briefly obstructed by a tree but then again spotted the object on its same coarse.  the object then accelerated out of sight in less than a second.  this entire encounter lasted about 3 minutes.  we had just started talking about how we did not believe what we just saw when another single object rose up from the same point as the other two objects and took the same path to the nw over our heads again.  i have always been curious about the unknown but now i am a believer.  what my family and i witnessed was not from this world.  we did manage to catch it on video but it is not very good other than just before the end of the video the digital recorder on the phone caught a very strange sequence of sounds we did not hear at the time.  i would love some more information on any similar objects people have seen.  oh i almost forgot,  these objects had absolutely no sound.  wow this was just incredible.
content.summary: Bright orange cylinder shaped object with red lights

content.detailedDescription: I was swimming at a friends apt, looked up in the southern sky. that's when i saw cigar shaped that also looked like a disc when it changed directions. i watched it move southeast for approximately 60 seconds. the object suddenly took off at an incredible speed. it was gone in an instant. i had no time to get out of the pool and photograph it. after i came home, i reported it to mufon. now, i do see a lot of planes in that area,but it was silent, no con trails,and did not look anything like a plane. i have also experienced visitation, but have difficulty remembering certain details.
content.summary: I was swimming at a friends apt looked up and saw it.

content.detailedDescription: Walking towards the dog's kennel from the greenhouse, crossing our property from west to east 9pm. the object i observed, was heading due west from my northeast turned almost immediately to the south as soon as i saw it. if east was 12:o'clock it made its turn south at the 11:o'clock position, continued south for 2 minutes, disappearing over the hill treeline at the 2:30o'clock position. it's heading was towards bloomington's west side it was about the height as the crop-dusters cruise by heading to their next job, and twice as large at the same distance. it made no sound, winds were calm. the object was a solid orange light, shereical, the intensity of the light didn't change as it moved across the horizon, and it maintained its altitude.
content.summary: Orange shpere of light slowely moving south above tree line.

content.detailedDescription: First noticed in the northeast, heading to the southwest.  shortly thereafter, it began to veer to the west and eventually to the northwest.  flew at normal speed for an aircraft, but was much too large to be a normal airplane;  basically reddish in color, but appeared to be ablaze.   finally, it disappeared from sight in the northwest.   witnessed by at least three people & was photographed.
content.summary: Glowing red as if on fire

content.detailedDescription: White shape changing object above koreatown/south eastern hollywood. some distance up in the air, possibly a mile, watched it change shape and hover over our area of visibility. believe it ended up traveling north. silver/whiteish, possibly reflective, multiple witnesses. appeared spherical, then l-shaped, back to circular. second time i've seen it, this time it was a lot higher than last.
content.summary: White circular shape changing object above koreatown, east hollywood

content.detailedDescription: I was at 37th st on the northwest side of indianapolis at work. i was doing security at a soccer game. the time was around 6:35p.M. and it was halftime. i just so happened to look up in the sky and noticed an object that looked like a white/gray balloon. i strained my eyes at first, i figured it might of been a plane or helicopter because the airport was about 6miles south of my location. they started to get lower and lower. the more i observed it hovered in one spot then it moved within the blink of an eye east. i was in shock i couldn't stop staring at it. i couldn't take my eyes of it them i felt like they new i was watching. it moved back in forth, then appeared 4 more of the same objects. they all got in formation, like the shape of a boomerang. there was a total of 5 ufo's. they drop almost down to cloud level then 1 by 1 they vanished straight up back into space with a blink of an eye.
content.summary: Multiple ufo sightings

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen very strange flaming object.
i'd been sitting on my terrace at my country house, when i noticed  a strange flying object above. this attracted my attention because it was flaming and firstly i thought that it was a burning detail part of a plane and maybe something had happened. but the flaming object had been flying in a straight trajectory. after that i called my friends and parents and it had changed trajectory slightly to the left and started to fly away ahead and up and we could make out that it was one object looked like it was made up of three flaming balls (one big and one small one on the each side).
that was very interesting to watch and after i became very interested to know what it was. i've made a picture to try and illustrate what i saw.
content.summary: Flaming object

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside our house with my family, while my dad, brother, and brother's friend were shooting off some fireworks in our backyard. looking up to see the fireworks, i noticed a ball of orange light moving across the sky, but at first i simply passed it off as an ember falling from the fireworks. a minute or so later, i looked behind me and there it was again, but this time i noticed it was moving sideways, not down, like an ember would do. so i said something to my mom and sister. my brother's friend overheard and commented that it was just some type of balloon, and everyone else seemed to agree.

but i wanted to watch it, because i wasn't so sure they were right, and i was curious, especially because of the bright orange color. it would dim occasionally, but not by much, and the way it was moving seemed a little odd. i went through the house into the front yard, because it had moved behind a tree. i stood out front, on the sidewalk, and as i watched, the object slowed down and then came to a stop for a moment. after about ten seconds, it began to move again, but this time very slowly. the flight path of the object was in a semi-circle, beginning in the north and moving to the south. i finally lost sight of it behind another tree. after this, i went back to watch more fireworks, but i was stilling wondering what it was.
content.summary: Orange ball of light moving across the sky in a semi-circle

content.detailedDescription: This a report on a second unidentified object witnessed by my wife two daughters and myself while monitoring an object in the northern sky. at 22:27 pst. my family and i were monitoring the actions of another object in the northern sky when i just happened to turn around and notice another white object suddenly appear and move across the sky from west to east. the object was high in altitude not orbital altitude perhaps 60 to 100 thousand feet. too high to be a plane and moving to fast. i thought perhaps it was the space station but it still didn't appear to be bright enough for that yet moving about the same speed. it was easy to determine the object was not an asteroid or space junk as it had no trail and no debris and this object was viewable across the sky far longer than something burning in the atmosphere. i quickly called the attention of my family and pointed out the object, marked the time and duration. we watched the object move across the sky then suddenly disappear. after the event transpired (20 seconds later), we returned to monitor our first object. i instructed my daughters to continue to watch the first object as i then proceeded to my laptop to see what the location of the space station was (south pacific-western chile), i then checked a couple websites that monitor most if not all satellites (even govt.) nothing along that trajectory reported. besides i thought it was too low in altitude to be a satellite and to bright.
content.summary: Fast moving object in night sky moving west to east stops then disappears

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my front yard with a friend with binoculars watching the stars. she had the binoculars and saw a ufo. she freaked out and gave the binoculars to me. i saw an object the was shaped like the head of a shovel only rounded in the back. it was like a pale light in color not metallic. it was moving from north to south from the yosemite national park area heading toward the ocean. 

it really didn't appear to be going that fast at first. all of the sudden, it shot straight up on a right angle. it then appeared to stop like it was hiding among the stars, like it was trying to blend in with them. it was 5 times faster than anything i've ever seen before. it moved in like a second. unbelievable! the weird thing is, i got the sense that it knew we saw it! we where both blow away and excited by this. 

i'm not one of these people that think everything in the sky is a ufo! i grew up in tustin ca next to a marine base (el toro) a marine helicopter base (mcas tustin) and john wayne airport. i know what military, commerical, and private aircraft look like. this was none to the above! i've had several other sighting but this was the most dramatic.
content.summary: Very strange ufo sighting over mariposa, ca

content.detailedDescription: Fourth of july night and my daughters ages(16-12) were lighting off fireworks out in the street in front of our house. my wife and i had just finished watching a portion of our paychecks go up in a sparkling shower of disappointment. i had walked out into the street to pick up the spent firework and deposit it into our quickly amassing pile of trash. as i stood back up and turned i noticed an object off in the distance glowing reddish orange and white. hovering and moving extremely slowly in a downward and westerly line. i monitored the objects movements using a tree and power line as a source of reference, to make sure that what i was witnessing wasn't just a passenger jet on approach to sea-tac airport. my observations were confirmed when the object got to a certain altitude and then stopped changed direction from downward westerly to 90 degrees and moving in an easterly direction. that is when i called the attention of my two daughters and wife to witness the event with me. i marked the time as 22:21 and then subtracted 5 minutes. now for something interesting during all of this---my family and i were facing north watching the reddish/orange/white sphere. i just happened to turn around a full 180 degrees (due south), and happened to notice a white object in the sky travelling from west to east at a high rate of speed.  i called everyones attention to what i was witnessing and we all watched as it shot across the sky for approximately 15-20 seconds. the object was at a much higher altitude and i thought maybe it was a satellite or the international space station, asteroid. it definitely was not an aircraft of conventional means. this secondary event happened at 22:27 as i had marked the time of this event and duration. what was interesting was that the object could not have been the space station, because when i checked the nasa and another website, they confirmed the station in orbit over the southern pacific approaching the western coast of chile. another interesting point, the object suddenly appeared travelling at a constant rate of speed then stopped and then just disappeared. careful further deduction also reduces the possibility  of an asteroid or space junk as there was no debris tail. i checked with a couple of websites that also track most known satellites and at that current moment there were none in our area or due to be in our area for another 23 minutes. besides the object was to bright to be a satellite to low in the atmosphere and moving to slow. as i was performing the preliminary information search and eliminating possibilities, my daughters and wife were continuing to monitor the first object which had now shifted to a position low in the horizon and staying stationary then moving westerly stopping raising in altitude dropping back down then moving slowly easterly. this activity continued for approximately six minutes longer till 22:49 when the object just disappeared. we tried to video tape the object but it was just to far and too dark.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reddish/orange sphere in night sky and white object travelling at high rate of speed, stops then sudden course alteration and disappears.
